1.content: First of all, Are you a boy or a girl?
1.title: First things first

11.content: You sprint to the bus one morning in your exhausted state with your younger sister Stacey, who is 13. You barely make the bus and plop down in a seat with her and start the trek to school.
11.title: Boy

choices: Wake up in an empty bus
Find yourself sitting in Stacey's hand
113.content:
After sitting down you turn to your sister and start to grow angry with her for not letting you sleep in. "Stacey, I told you to let me sleep if mom and dad don't wake me up, I don't care about going to school if they aren't around".

Stacey turns to you with a look of disgust and replies: "But mom told me that while they are in Europe for the winter, I am supposed to make sure you go to school!"

"I don't care what they said. I am older, so I make the rules while they are gone" you shoot back.

Your parents had a relative die in the family, and through a aggravating and drawn out process, were forced to fly to Europe and settle your relative's estate. You aren't really home alone all the time. Your Aunt Diane comes and checks up on you occasionally, and even stays the night every once in a while. But for the most part it is just the two of you.


"Thats it, I've had it with you!!" Stacey yells. You feel a tingling sensation, and all fades to black.
113.title: Your sister shrinks you

choices: You are almost killed by the bus driver
1131.content:
You wake up and slowly scratch your eyes and try to figure out what happened. You slowly look around and realize you had shrunk to about a half an inch tall!

The bus was empty, it must have arrived at school sometime while you were knocked out. You get up from the floor of the bus, and decide that you should probably hike to the door (which seemed like miles from your seat), and try to find some help, or at least your sister.
1131.title: Wake up in an empty bus

11312.content:
After about an hour of walking, you make it to the front of the bus, where once again, you don't see anybody around. You realize that the steps are about a 100 feet tall at your size, and its gonna be tough to get down to the ground. You want to turn back and find another exit, but what if the bus leaves before you walk miles to the other end of the bus.

All of a sudden, the older female bus driver, whom you came to know as Mrs. King, starts walking towards the bus. She props open the door and makes her way up the steps, directly towards you!
11312.title: The bus driver doesn't see you

choices: Go into your school and get help from a teacher
113121.content:
Just as she was about to unknowingly smash you with her huge black boots, you decide to make a last ditch effort to survive.

You leap into the open air towards the entrance to the bus. You land with a painful thud on the ground, just as the doors shut, and the bus pulls away.

You are pretty banged and bruised up, but you are alive. What should you do now?
113121.title: Barely Make it

1131211.content: Now you are standing naked in the cold parking lot at a half an inch tall. You decide that since your sister was the one that shrunk you to this size in the first place, she might not be a good choice for saving you. There are tons of teachers inside the school, they have to help you, its part of some sort of teacher's code right? You make another hike towards the entrance, and crawl through the crack under the door. You are finally inside the school
1131211.title: Go into your school and get help from a teacher

11312112.content: You decide that the more people that could possibly find you, the better, so you head towards the main hallway in the building which houses most of the classrooms, the gym, the nurses office, and the daycare for teachers with children. Which do you try first?
11312112.title: Go towards the classrooms

choices: The Gym ( Its worth a shot right?)
A Classroom (Somebody out of an entire class has got to notice you?)
113121121.content: Which one should you go to first?
113121121.title: Classroom or Gym

1131211211.content:
The gym isn't too far from where you are, and you decide to go for it. After a long hike, you make it to the gym doors, squeeze under them, and take a look around.


There are a few girls playing basketball, and mostly people getting ready to go change and go to their next class. You see your sister loitering near the girls locker room, so you decide you will catch up with her and see what she can do to turn you back, or you could decide to talk to your gym teacher
1131211211.title: The Gym ( Its worth a shot right?)

11312112111.content:
You run as quickly as you can, and after a few minutes you reach the girls locker room just as your sister is walking inside, not noticing you. You decide that you can probably get her attention before she changes her clothes.

As you shuffle inside, you look around in awe at all of the nude and semi nude bodies around you. Some of these girls are girls you could have only dreamed of seeing one day, but now you are getting the opportunity without their knowledge. You snap out of it and hurry to catch up to her sister.

Once you reach her locker, you jump up and down trying to get her attention.
11312112111.title: Go to your sister

choices: The Nurse's Office (She is a health professional right?)
The Daycare (They are used to dealing with people smaller than them?)
113121122.title: Nurses office or Daycare

choices: Go try to get the nurses attention
Get the one of the girls attention first
1131211221.content:
You decide to high tail it to the nurse's office. She is a health professional, and you are a student, she has gotta help you! You make it to the door and squeeze through the crack at the bottom.

As you enter you see two girls sitting in some chairs waiting to be seen, and the nurse rummaging through the cabinets.
1131211221.title: The Nurse's Office (She is a health profess...

choices: Get their attention by yelling and waving your arms
11312112212.content: You decide that since the girls are sitting in chairs near you, that it would be best to get their attention since they are closer. How do you get their attention
11312112212.title: Get the one of the girls attention first

choices: You make it up her leg onto her lap
113121122122.content: You decide the best way to get their attention and ultimately get found is to try to climb up one of them. You quickly jog over to the girls foot and begin your climb.
113121122122.title: Climb onto one of them

choices: Jump and hope you survive the fall
Ride it out to the bathroom
1131211221221.content:
After what seemed like the longest and hardest climb of your life, you make it up to the girl's lap. As you sit there panting and trying to revive your strength, you hear the girl say to Miss Newman (The Nurse), "I am on my period and I just need a maxi pad and to use the bathroom".

"Sure thing honey" Miss Newman say, pulling a pad out of a drawer and pointing towards the private bathroom. You only have two options here...
1131211221221.title: You make it up her leg onto her lap

choices: Hold on to the Zipper for dear life!
Go for the girl's underwear and hope for the best
11312112212212.content:
You imagine yourself falling and landing with a splat on the ground, and realize that the fall might kill you, so you decide to ride it out. You grab a tight hold on the zipper of the girl's jeans, and hope for the best.

She stands up and grabs the maxi pad, and she goes into the bathroom. This was not what you had in mind when you wanted to talk to the nurse!

After shutting the door, she pulls down her pants, with you still hanging on, to reveal her heavily blood stained panties. You let out a shriek and try to decide what to do, but your grasp is slipping on the zipper...
11312112212212.title: Ride it out to the bathroom

choices: Try to get the girl's attention somehow
Try to escape your new Prison
113121122122122.content:
You decide that you will surely fall if you do not do something, so you swing your self up, and begin tumbling down the front of the girl's panties, right onto the freshly laid maxi pad.

You look up in terror and arousal as the girls vagina comes to meet you as the girl pulls her panties up. She zips up her pants and walks out of the bathroom. She thanks the nurse, and walks back to class.
113121122122122.title: Go for the girl's underwear and hope for th...

1131211221222.content:
You make it about 3/4 of the way up her leg, and you look down to check your progress. You realize you are about 100 "feet" up in the air, and begin to panic. You lose your grip, and fall to the ground, breaking most of the bones in your body and paralyzing you.

One of the girls stands up after a minute, and without even seeing you, lands the heel of her shoe on you, smashing you and killing you.
1131211221222.title: You Fall

1131211222.content:
Although you have never actually been in the daycare before, you decide it has to be a good option, because they are always looking down at people smaller than them anyway, maybe they will spot you?

You hitch rides on a few people's shoes as they walk down the hallway to their class, and make it to the daycare in just a few minutes. You crawl under the door and are greeted with the scent of baby powder and a scene of chaos in the room as 3 attendants chase 30 or so children around the room. Just near the door is a changing table with stacks of pull ups and diapers next to it, and you decide that might be a good way to get up to a better vantage point, so you begin climbing them.
1131211222.title: The Daycare (They are used to dealing with peop...

choices: She puts you in her diaper
11312112221.content:
All of a sudden you hear a gurgling sound and are grabbed with a moist slobber drenched grip of one of the babies in the daycare.

You scream as the baby brings you up to her face.

What happens next?
11312112221.title: Found by a baby

11312112222.content:
After climbing for a few minutes, you finally reach the top of a stack of pull ups, and survey the scene around you, as you try to decide how to get past the 10 foot gap to the changing table. All of a sudden you see an aide walking towards you while carrying a little girl who couldn't be more than a year and a half old on her hip. It seems like she is looking right at you, and you breathe a sigh of relief as you believe that you will finally be found, and this situation will be over.

As she draws nearer you hear her saying "Aw Katie you little stinker, your mom said you were working on your potty training, but now look at you, dropping a big poopie in your diaper". You realize she is just looking to change this little girl into a new diaper, and doesn't actually see you.

You sprint to the edge of the stack and begin to climb down. Before you know it she has the diaper in her hand, and your only choice besides falling is to crawl inside.
11312112222.title: Found?

choices: Get trapped in the Fresh Diaper
Get trapped in the dirty diaper
113121122221.content: She sets the diaper that you climbed inside of down on the table and unfolds it, revealing your nude teen body to the aide and the child. You wave your arms and scream, but once again, there is no way she is going to see somebody so small. She lays the girl down on the table just above you and you only have two options, both with a small chance of survival...
113121122221.title: Trapped in a diaper

choices: Stay Put and hope for the best
Decide this was a horrible idea and look for a way out.
1131211222211.content:
You decide that instead of risking it out in the open you should go for the fresh diaper. You jump onto the soft clean diaper just as the daycare aide is sealing it shut.

You are forced up against the front wall of the diaper, and pinned between the diaper and the girl's warm body. What do you do now
1131211222211.title: Get trapped in the Fresh Diaper

1131211222212.content: You decide that you would rather try to ride this thing out in the dirty diaper, despite how disgusting it looked, because at least you wouldn't get crushed by a baby girl. As the aide undoes the tapes and and makes cooing noises at the little girl, you leap from the clean diaper to the dirty one, landing in a pile of soft and moist poop, and causes you to get stuck.
1131211222212.title: Get trapped in the dirty diaper

11312112222122.content: The aide looks down at the soiled diaper and wrinkles her nose. "Good thing we just put the poopy ones in the trash compactor" She exclaims. You realize that the compactor means certain death. You scream out to the aide as she finishes moving Katie onto the new diaper, but to her you just look like another little piece of poop, and she couldn't hear you in this loud chaotic room anyway. You begin to weep and wet yourself in fear knowing that this is the end of it for you. With an unknowing smile the aid rolls up the diaper with you trapped inside it, and tosses it into the garbage compactor. As the trash gets smashed with you inside it, the aide goes about her day not knowing that she just killed a 16 year old boy trapped inside a poopy diaper.
11312112222122.title: Brought to the trash compactor

113122.content:
You wave your arms and scream "Mrs.King, I'm down here!!!! Please help me!!!" But she doesn't hear you. She reaches the top of the stairs right above you, and looks down right at you.

"Great, not only do I have to put up with these kids, but now I have a bug problem on my bus..." she says as she raises up her foot above you.

"Please no!" You scream in a last effort to save yourself, but its useless.

"Goodbye little buggie" she mutters as she quickly brings her boot down on top of you, crushing you, and killing you instantly. She shuts the doors, and goes about her day.
113122.title: Crushed

1132.content:
You slowly come to, and realize that there is a gigantic face in front of you. You scream and crawl backwards, only to realize it is your sister Stacey.

"My, my, how the tables have turned on you" she says in a voice that sounds like a lion's roar at your size.

You look around at everything that is now suddenly huge around you, and then realize that not only have you been shrunk, but you are butt naked (shrank out of your clothes), and at your sister's mercy!

" Please Stacey, Change me back, or get me help, Do something! Don't leave me like this!" You plead with the giant.

With a chuckle and a blast of warm breath in your face your sister says "Why would I change you back? I think I may like having you this size until mom and dad come home. I have the perfect story for the police too. My brother ran off after he and I got into a fight. I haven't seen him since."

A shudder runs down your spine as you understand that you may be stuck like this for quite some time.

" Well now, lets have a look at you!" she exclaims as she surveys your tiny body in her hand. "oh wow, you're naked! and look at how small your pee pee got!" She said, giving it a flick with her index finger, "But don't worry, its only a little bit smaller than the time I saw you naked in the shower last year" she continued.

At this point, you are well on your way to tears, and don't know what to do.
1132.title: Find yourself sitting in Stacey's hand

11321.content:
You decide that Stacey is the one that put this curse upon you, so she is the probably the only one that can make it go away. Your only logical course of action then is to stay with her.


After a few more minutes of verbal lashings and her violating you with her fingers, she realizes that she will be at school very soon.

"Hmm, well I can't have you in my hand the entire school day now can I?" She asks rhetorically with a grin.

Where should I put you?
11321.title: Put up with Stacey

113212.content: Where else could she put you?
113212.title: Another option

1132122.content: Which of these would be a good place to put you for safe keeping?
1132122.title: Another option

choices: It's another group of shrunken persons!
It's a small tear in the purse fabric!
11321222.content:
"I should put you in here for now. And if you're a bother to me during school, I won't hesitate to crush you." Stacey says coldly, before you heard a click, and were dropped into a absolutely massive (to you) coin purse. "Now, behave yourself." Stacey said. "You can't do this to me!!" You shouted. "Of course I can. You're my bug now." She said. She closed the top to the coin purse, and you jingled around in the empty bag.

"What is that over there?" You asked yourself, getting up, and walking to the other side of the purse.
11321222.title: In a Coin Purse

11322.content:
You decide you would rather die than be stuck in this situation, naked and harassed by your little sister.


You quickly stand up, and make a leap into the thin air, praying to god that you make it as your sisters hands wave in the air trying to grab you on your way down.

As the ground quickly approaches, you bounce off one of your sister's flailing hands, slowing your fall, before you land with a thud on the floor. You are in pain, but know you can't just lay there. You stumble to your feet, and sprint towards the seat in front of you. As you get farther away, your sister leans down below the seat and whispers "Good luck getting out of this situation without me". You make it up to the next seat in front of you, and It is a girl who is your age sitting there named Kristen. What do you do?
11322.title: Escape!

choices: You talk to people on the bus
Your annoying little sister sprints onboard after you
12.content: After getting up an hour early, you were finally pleased with your appearance and you are ready for school. You walk out to the bus, and hop on, ready to see your friends and have a good day.
12.title: Girl

121.content:
Peter griffin gets on the bus and eats everyone, nah


a bunch of kids exit the bus and you run under a seat. You turn around and see a backpack, it moves towards you fast and you grip a zipper. You are carried far up and lose grip, but mini-spiderman swings in to the rescue. You fly with him on a string and fly out of the computer screen,kicking the reader out of his chair.
121.title: You shrink on the bus

choices: Spiderman goes rabid and bites you
the reader tears off his shirt, revealing himself to be Superman
1213.content: ARGHKKKKKKKKKKK!!!, you spin around to see spiderman twitching violently.
1213.title: spiderman has a seizure instantly

choices: you move your right thumb, causing reality to explode into nothing,what now?
12133.content: The reader gets cranky and begins to cry.
12133.title: the reader tears off his shirt, revealing himse...

choices: you manage to construct Norton-antivirus and remove the malware from your toes.
121332.content: You are in a white void by yourself, and have 2 hours before the T-virus in your blood stream turns you into a office chair.
121332.title: you move your right thumb, causing reality to e...

choices: the sumo has a heart attack.
the sumo presses a button on the keyboard and breaks the keyboard in two.
1213321.content: A very obese sumo sits on you, breaking you.
1213321.title: you turn into a chair

choices: the head flies through your screen and lands on your lap
12133212.content: rabid spiderman jumps out of a sewer and thrusts his hand through the sumo's neck.
12133212.title: the sumo presses a button on the keyboard and b...

choices: you have no idea what to do
you have horrid hallucinations of demon tellie tubbies
121332122.title: the head flies through your screen and lands on...

info.brief_description: You are a normal 16 year old high school kid. Suddenly, one day you shrink at school...
info.description:
You are a at school one day, and you randomly shrink for no reason. What happens next is up to you!


Content: Can be pretty much anything you want, go wild. Keep in mind that some younger folks may read this though.

Let me know if there is a certain kind of chapter you want me to add, something to change, or add something yourself!
